title: Mobile App Developer
description:
This position is for Waves - a project of Swipe Mango

○ Build and deploy an audio and podcast mobile application from scratch using the latest technologies (eg, React Native, iOS, Android)
○ App features will include: User authentication, RSS feed ingestion, Audio streaming, Ratings and Reviews
○ Writing clear and maintainable code
○ Work in a high-growth, fast-paced environment where you will contribute to the decision making process. UI for this product will be incredibly important, and the website developer has hands on experience with product features and applications, and should be able to discuss and suggest ideas for the product
requirements:
○ Fluent in English and Vietnamese, enough to work with content in both languages
○ At least 1 year of experience developing native mobile applications (iOS, Android), React native/ flutter
○ Server-side / Middleware experience (REST API services, microservices)

Include these in your application
○ Any websites you have built or a portfolio of any projects you have done
○ Links to online profiles you use (GitHub, Twitter, etc)
○ A description of your work history (a resume / CV, LinkedIn profile)
